name: Fire Flying
description:
A strategic wildfire fighting game! Use your aircraft to drop water on the spreading fire.
Protect buildings and towns from the blazing wildfire.
Plan ahead and use chokepoints to utilise the water better and take the wind direction into account.

Features:
*22 exciting and fire-filled levels.
*8 Achievements with Game Center support.
*Three different aircraft types, each with their own strengths.
*Upgrade your aircraft as you earn upgrade points.
*Simple touch interface, complex strategies.


The in-app purchase is a single optional purchase that remove the advertising.
